amendment.description: Amendment strengthens the involvement of community colleges in the development and implementation of a national cybersecurity strategy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-410 to strengthen the involvement of community colleges in the development and implementation of a national cybersecurity strategy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Roskam.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
